sentences.sContent: You can buy anything you want.
He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.sCn: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.sContent: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.sCn: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.sContent: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.sCn: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

sentences.sContent: ...and you really felt anything was possible...
...I had my heart set on it and I didn’t let anything stand in my way...
...powered by anything from solar power to natural gas...
...but the big food companies--which want to sell anything except the raw ingredients that go into cooking－made the home cook an endangered species...
...I was not able to produce anything for three years...
...I’ll be glad to help you with anything I can...
...I'd also be happy to pick up anything you need...

phrases.pCn: 或者其他别的事，或其他什么的
无论如何（用于否定句中）
[委婉语](女子)见潮红，来例假[系“有喜了”的委婉说法]
（用于疑问或条件句）多多少少；一点…的味儿；很少
[口]拼命地；非常猛地；全力地；象什么似的
怎么都行；任何事情都可能发生
胜任各项工作；对一切都适用

trans.tranOther: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which
